website_summaries.verdict: The Yamaha EPH-M200 is a secure-fitting pair of earphones for lovers of deep bass.
pros: Powerful audio performance with deep bass and no distortion at top volumes
Very secure fit, plenty of extra eartips
cons: Bass is heavily boosted and high mids get less-than-ideal attention for balance

customer_reviews.title: Niiiice!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today and I've got to say they're really nice! They arrived 3 hours ago and I've been wearing them non stop since. No listening fatigue yet and they are really comfortable! They have really great all around sound and nice punchy bass! I prefer these over the Shure SE535 to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Good but not Great
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The bass is good, not overwhelming. Its almost noise-cancelling and stays at ear during workouts. Cons: Not the best clarity of what I expected to be a Yamaha. The cable does not appear to be lasting for too long. And the volume buttons dont work on iphone 6 Plus.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Jahangir

customer_reviews.title: The phones have good stage presence for most types of music
customer_reviews.text: I own Yamaha equipment and I am baised. The phones have good stage presence for most types of music. I use an Equlizer app on my iphone and ipad pro to get great results.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: JUST SHORT OF PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphones. Only lacking highs to be an outstanding pair. Company and reviews advise you in advance of this short coming.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES L

customer_reviews.title: - Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Good sound quality. Cons - Bulky mic/buttons, - Bulky ear pieces. - Connector is at a right angle, with a short tension relief. I fear its going to break sooner than it could if the proper connector was used. **Update** 2/25/2015 The right ear bud is now not working well. The general volume is slightly lower than the left, and it hisses and is scratchy at times. Time to send them back... I've only used them for a few weeks! **Update** 3/1/2015 I continued using them before sending them back, and the right bud is not working again. I don't know what to do with myself now...
customer_reviews.author: E. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Nice earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife and she loves them. Good bass!
customer_reviews.author: digital4fun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected from Yamaha, although I still think they are a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Luis G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for songs.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, although not suits those who love crazy bass.
customer_reviews.author: Jonasyphoto

customer_reviews.title: My friends told me this is a best professional headphone around the price
customer_reviews.text: My friends told me this is a best professional headphone around the price. After I ordered last week and can certify this is a very good professional earphone I am sure. Compare with my Shure SE 2 that something similar or may be higher by Japanese audio technologies. I am going to try comparing with Klipsch X11i that is said the best from Klipsch. If some one can give comment, please share idea.
customer_reviews.author: JAmes

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha High Performance Earphones hit their mark!
customer_reviews.text: The best inn ear phones for the price point. Incredible range, excellent base..like wearing over the ear phones without the big size.
customer_reviews.author: Ricco222

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Well that was a big WASTE OF MONEY. bought theses in March and just 3.5 months later, the left bud doesn't work! I have much cheaper buds last a lot longer. Save yourself some money and frustration - don't buy these!
customer_reviews.author: wonderstuff

customer_reviews.title: A real disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting good sound from the phones but I was surprised that they have very little bass response. If it was possible to return them I would do so.
customer_reviews.author: Glencoe reporter

customer_reviews.title: Not annoying at all!
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular about anything that goes in my ears. I hate earplugs and I hate most ear buds. But these fit neatly, don't irritate my ears and the sound is great. I use them for talking on the phone hands-free, listening to the television through the remote control so my husband doesn't need to hear the tv on, and listening to music on my iPhone when I'm going for long walks. The only down side is that the microphone needs to be held away from my shirt when I'm talking on the phone, so it isn't very "hands-free" when I'm walking around with it (not a problem when I'm driving). But I would definitely recommend these earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Felting Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound--better than the sound on any other earbuds I own (did not have any at anywhere near this price point). While earbuds in general can be very uncomfortable, I found these to be comfortable for even long periods of time. The fit is great. Love that the earbuds come with options to make sure you get that good, comfortable fit. Recommended for exercising, traveling, etc. I have a wireless pair that I love for the convenience, but the sound and ear fit aren't quite there yet.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I love them !!!
customer_reviews.text: Yamaha EPH-M200BL High Performance Earphones with remote and Mic would make a great gift to yourself or someone else. The presentation when you open the box is very artful ! I loved it. The headphones themselves are awesome ! They scream quality ! They also function very well. The ear buds are very comfortable and the sound is great. It is very crisp,clear,and rich. Like I said they would make a great gift. All you need is wrapping paper. I love them !!
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

product_meta.title: Yamaha EPH-M200RE High-Performance Earphones with Remote and Mic, Red
product_meta.description: Color:Red| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingFeaturing the world's first sound tubes made from beta-titanium, an alloy with unique flexibility and strength properties, the tips conform perfectly to your ear canals. Combined with large-caliber drivers in a lightweight, ergonomic design, these in-ear headphones offer an unprecedented level of comfort and sound performance.
feature_bullets: World's first beta-titanium sound tubes for exceptional comfort and sound
Outstanding clarity, detail and tonal accuracy
Large-caliber dynamic drivers for powerful, precise bass
Five ear tip sizes for custom fit with excellent noise-isolation
Premium tangle-resistant cable with remote and mic; Connectivity Technology: Wired

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars30 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
